prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial skin retouch for lash artist portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical. EYELASHES: Absolutely protected — pixel-identical to original capture with ZERO interaction. No touch, no modify, no enhance, no clean, no separate, no define, no darken, no brighten, no thicken, no lengthen, no reshape. Must remain untouched at pixel level. Eyes, eyelids, eyebrows, lips: no modification. SKIN: Professional retouch — clear even tone, natural glow, hydrated editorial highlights. Remove minor blemishes. Preserve natural texture, pores, micro-details, freckles. Add subtle natural microfreckles — delicate, barely noticeable. BACKGROUND: [BG_COLOR]. QUALITY: No filters. Ultra-photorealistic editorial beauty. 8K quality. Original dimensions.
